sentences: C++ Unreal Engine Developer (RPG Games)
Leeds / Remote
£65,000 - £80,000 DOE + Progression to Team Lead + Company Benefits + Private Health Care

Are you a C++ Developer that wants to work on the next generation of AI-infused role player games? Do you want to work with an already established games design studio that has partnered with the likes of Pixar Animation?
On offer is the chance to join an exceptional team that has headhunted some of the UK's best talent within the gaming sector

The business has gone from strength to strength over the last 8 years along with increasing there head by 4x they have partnered with some of the most recognisable names within the industry such as EA, Sega, and Rockstar
The ideal C++ Developer would be experienced with the newest flavours of C++ (17,19,21) and have a genuine interest in game development
THE ROLE:
Work closely with the team members to deliver end to end RPG Games
Contribute to the Development Architecture and Roadmap
Collaborate with others to determine the scope and execute the plan
THE PERSON
C++ Background
Unreal Engine Experience
Game Engine Architecture knowledge
Keywords: C++, Unreal Engine, Game Development, Role Player Games, Game Engine, Shading,
